segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes by the sink, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed the water overflowing from the sink yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting bigger and bigger, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy climbing on the stool to reach the cookie jar, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching his arm as far as he can, but he can't quite reach it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really unstable, and I'm worried he might fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing next to him, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's trying to be quiet so the woman doesn't hear them and get angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside the window looks very peaceful and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the chaos happening inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees the children before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
